subject: Black Friday Discounts on Plus X Pedals
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

Thank you very much for taking the time to read my email and I hope this
find you in good health and happiness.

I’ve been looking all over the internet for a set of high quality pedals at
a affordable price and I have kept hearing a lot of great things about your
Plus X pedals they sound like the absolute top of the line for sim racing,
and I’m really interested in getting them. However, even after the many
amazing deals you have to offer the summer season has left me in a less
than desirable position to be able to afford the set.

I’m planning ahead for November Black Friday and I wanted to write to the
team to see if you let me know if you’ll be offering any Black Friday
discounts or deals on the Plus X pedals (or other products)? It would
really help me on my thought budget and make sure I don’t miss out.

Thanks a lot for your time, I really appreciate it and look forward to
hopefully joining the Simsonn community soon!

Best regards,

Robert Cristian

conversations.body_text: Hi SJ,      Yes, we will be running Black Friday promotions and discounts. However, if you'd like to join us early, we can provide you with an exclusive discount code equivalent to our Black Friday offer.

Hi,

Thank you so much for the opportunity and to even take the time to read my
email means a lot to me, many other companies would have brushed it under
the rug and left me on read. However, you have showed true respect and
compassion for the sim racing community not by just being able to provide
the average person with a set of pedals rivalling some of the best but also
showing amazing support not only for me but for others as well.

I will be sure to post a personal review on multiple sites and platforms to
show the world how much the company cares about the community they are part
of. I will try to not send everyone to you for free stuff but if it does
I’m sorry.

Thanks so much once again for the opportunity and I am definitely looking
forward to my set of pedals and will definitely get the haptic system as
well when I have the money.

On Sat, 30 Aug 2025 at 04:29, service@simsonn.com

Hi SJ,     Thank you so much for your kind words — it truly means a lot to us. At Simsonn, our goal has always been to create high-quality gear for sim racers while also supporting the community that makes this sport so special. Reading your message confirms that we’re moving in the right direction, and we couldn’t be happier to have you with us on this journey.  We really appreciate your willingness to share your experience and spread the word about Simsonn. Support like yours helps us grow and continue bringing new innovations to sim racing.  We understand your situation, and assisting you aligns with our mission. Our goal is to help every racer immerse themselves in reliable, realistic driving adventures—without overspending.  You can use this discount code: Black45 for an instant $45 off orders over $219.  Thanks again for your recognition and praise — we can’t wait for you to experience your new pedals and to hear your feedback once you’ve had the chance to put them through their paces!     Best regards, The Simsonn Team
